name: Rat Race (itch) (BreakerHale, Prometheousl, gsrishti)
description:
Welcome to corpoRATe world! The global rat population is facing the Blue Plague, forcing all corporats to work from home. Your key performance indicator will be based on how well you can manage your job under your boss remotely, while maintaining your current relationships with friends and coworkers.

(Started for Marathon Jam 2022, completed for the "Finish It" Narrative Game Jam 2022)

Controls:

  • Point-and-click with Mouse/Trackpad

Credits:

  • BreakerHale - Project Manager, Artist, Writer ( https://leahhong.carrd.co/ )
  • Srishti Gupta - Artist, UI Designer, Writer ( https://srishtigupta.com/ | https://www.instagram.com/squishicreations/ )
  • Prometheousl - Programmer
  • Wesley P. - Programmer
  • John Richardson - Composer ( https://www.instagram.com/jrich.music/ )
